title: The meaning of seeing police in a dream by Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: The police in a dream. The police are the main backbone of society, and without them we do not feel safe and protected. There are many different departments. When the dreamer sees the police in a dream, he is surprised and may be afraid. In this article, we take into consideration together the most important things that interpretation scholars have said about this vision. What is the interpretation? Dreaming of the police in a dream? If the dreamer sees a traffic accident in a dream, this symbolizes his good morals. If the oppressed person sees the police in the dream, this indicates the good news that he will receive and God will ridicule those who stand by him. But if the dreamer sees the police chasing him in the dream, This symbolizes the bad qualities that he is known for and he needs to get rid of them. If a single man sees in a dream that the police are arresting him, it indicates the date of his marriage to a woman of knowledge and money. If the dreamer sees the entire officer in a dream, this indicates how satisfied the father is with her and the good condition Which she will enjoy. If an unmarried woman sees a policeman in a dream, this promises her an imminent marriage to someone who will love her and be happy with it in stability. If the dreamer sees the policeman calling his name in a dream, this means that he has great ambition and will have a bright future. As in the case in which he sees In which the dreamer sees a policeman carrying a gun, it promises her many good things and a wide diet that she will enjoy. The police in a dream by Ibn Sirini Ibn Sirbin says that seeing the police in a dream indicates the safety and protection that she will enjoy in her life without disturbance. In the event that the dreamer sees a policeman in a dream , it symbolizes the fulfillment of ambitions and the achievement of various goals. But if a man sees the police entering his house in his dream, this means bliss with happiness and many good things that will come to him. For the dreamer to see police officers calling him by his name means that he will reach the goals that he aspires to so much. Also The dreamer seeing many policemen rushing towards her indicates that she has committed many sins and disobedience and must repent to God. Seeing businessmen accusing the dreamer in a dream means that there are many enemies around him and they are the cause of the problems presented to him. If a young man sees stars on the shoulders of Policemen in a dream, this foretells to him the brilliant success that he will soon achieve. If the dreamer sees that the police are arresting him, this leads to many mistakes and problems that he will be exposed to during that period. If the fortuneteller sees the police in his dream, this means that he will marry a woman of prestige and morals. Nabila. What is the interpretation of seeing a policeman in a single woman’s dream? There are many interpretations about seeing the police for unmarried women in a dream and linking close marriage to a person with a high social status. If the dreamer sees a policeman in a dream, it symbolizes the protection and love that she aspires to and wishes for. In her life. As for the girl who sees the police entering her house in her dream, this indicates the many crises that she will face and getting into things that she did not want. If the dreamer actually wants to marry a police officer and sees this in

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a wedding in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married woman: Attending a wedding is one of the most important happy occasions, whether it belongs to the fortuneteller and his family, or to a friend. When we interpret the dream of marriage in a dream for a married woman, we find that the meaning of the dream is largely related to her married life and her children, and interpretations rarely deviate from this context, and here is everything Lawyers in a dream about marriage. What is the interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married woman? A woman may need to This wonderful atmosphere in which family and friends gather is not only on the wedding day, but as is customary in Arab countries, the wedding celebration may continue for several days and nights and before the women begin to prepare for it. Marriage, whether in terms of preparing the bride or the marital nest. Sometimes a woman sees that she is wearing a beautiful, bright white wedding dress, and this dream is a sign of her happy married life and the degree of understanding between her and her husband. The appearance of a wedding party in a dream for a married woman is good news for her if she does not have children and is thinking She is very much in her need to have a child in her life, because God gives her good news about the imminent fulfillment of this hope. , because he gets all the reasons. As for the invitation to attend the wedding, the dreamer really hates the bride, and there are many disagreements between them, it may be time for reconciliation, and if she goes in her elegant clothes to attend the ceremony, then she is tolerant. Heart and no grudge against anyone. If she attends the wedding without any aspect of happiness for the newlyweds, she will face some problems in the family context and may suffer from someone’s hatred for her because of her hatred, so she will try to look for reasons to disturb her life. If her husband was absent for a period and struggled alone to raise the children and endured the hardships of playing the role of father and mother, and she found herself wearing an elegant wedding dress, it would be better for the husband to return, and so on. Her married life will become more stable. One of the dreams that causes anxiety is that a married woman attends a wedding filled with musical instruments and songs and sees herself dancing and swaying happily, and this means that she does not deserve the role of wife and mother, because of her indifference. Which makes her not look to God in her husband or in her children, so her life collapses because of her scandalous actions. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s wedding by Ibn Sirin Sometimes a woman sees herself in the bride’s clothes, and a stranger appears in the groom’s suit, so if this groom is one of her relatives, then she is connecting the womb that was cut off from her. Before, and if it is unknown, there are a number of marital disputes. Which prompts a woman to request a divorce. Ibn Sirin also said that attending the wedding of people you do not know is an expression of your need for positive change after you have suffered a lot of worries and problems recently. If a member of her family suffers from any psychological or physical problem, the matter will quickly end and turn Sadness and anxiety turn into happiness and peace of mind. Her preparations for her daughter’s wedding are a metaphor for the girl’s good manners for which she was known to her acquaintances, as well as her academic excellence. If the dreamer has an unmarried brother or sister, this is good news of the approaching date of their wedding and the state of happiness that prevails in all marriages.

title: Interpretation of the Messenger’s dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Messenger: It is one of the favorite dreams of all Muslims. Who among us does not rejoice when he dreams of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, and seeing him is considered correct because Satan does not come in his image, and this was mentioned in an authentic hadith in the Sunnah of the Prophet. The one who sees this dream is often righteous, and this vision is attributed to God’s satisfaction with the dreamer due to the righteousness of his deeds. Interpretation of the dream of the Messenger: Whoever sees the Holy Prophet in a dream and has good eyesight, which indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s condition, but if the Messenger is in a bad condition, this is evidence of a deterioration in the condition of the dreamer. Seeing the Messenger in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve all his goals and ambitions in the near future, God willing. Dreaming of the Prophet in a dream is considered one of the good dreams that always lead to the arrival of benefits and a sign of livelihood and good luck. The Messenger in the dream indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will improve for the better and is a sign of the death of any person. Worries and problems. Dreaming of the Messenger in a dream indicates the many blessings that the dreamer will receive and an indication that he lives in peace and stability. The dreamer who sees the Messenger in a dream is a sign of enjoying his pride and dignity and a sign of the defeat of enemies and the end of strife. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of the ProphetsFollowing the Messenger In a dream, it leads to relief from distress and the replacement of poverty with wealth, and is a sign of the dreamer’s satisfaction with everything in his life. Whoever sees the Prophet in his dream is a dream that symbolizes good circumstances and an indication of the ease of things. If the dreamer is imprisoned and sees the Prophet in his dream, this is a sign that he will receive Freedom soon. future. Seeing the Messenger of someone who has opponents and enemies is a sign of their defeat and victory over them. If someone has lost some of his rights and has been exposed to oppression and injustice, if he sees the Messenger in his dream, this is a sign that his rights will be restored again and the injustice will be removed from him. Seeing the Messenger in a dream in the form of a child means that the dreamer is pure. He enjoys inner peace and sincerity. Interpretation of a dream about the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, for unmarried women. If a girl sees the Holy Messenger in her dream, this is evidence of her good morals and good behavior among the public. The dreamer seeing the Messenger in his dream is one of the dreams that symbolize the dreamer’s religiosity and preserving his purity and honor. Seeing the Prophet smiling In a dream of an unmarried girl, it indicates the arrival of some happy occasions and happy occasions for the dreamer. An unmarried woman who sees the dream’s messenger in her dream, which symbolizes marriage to a religious man with a large dose of religion and morals. A girl who sees the messenger in her dream is one of the dreams that indicate She is distinguished from her peers in good morals, love of goodness, and helping others. Interpretation of the dream of the Prophet for a married woman: A woman who has been exposed to oppression and injustice in her life, if she sees the Messenger in her dream, this is a sign of the coming of relief, relief of distress, and the return of rights to their owners for the second time. Seeing the Holy Prophet in A wife’s dream indicates her husband’s high status among people and his excellence in good morals. A woman who sees the Messenger in her dream is evidence of her good condition and that she is characterized by gentleness and kindness, and some interpreters believe that this indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing someone talking to a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone talking to the dead in a dream via the roy2a.com website. Dreaming of a dead person talking to you in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness, overcoming difficulties, leaving anxiety and sadness, and long conversations indicate longevity, and we will explain that in this article. Interpretation of seeing someone talking to a dead person In dreams for single girls, married women, pregnant women, men, single young men, divorcees, and widows, and providing interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, and other interpreters, ancient and modern, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing someone talking to a dead person in a dream about Ibn Sirin? Seeing someone talking to the dead in a dream is a good thing to get what you want. Seeing the dead sayings to the living and embracing them in a dream indicates longevity and good health. Dreaming about the dead talking to the living and giving them food. It indicates that the dreamer will have many opportunities and money. Abundance. Seeing a dead person speaking to the living and condemning him in a dream indicates that the dreamer is committing many mistakes and sins. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person writing in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person talking to a dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman? If a girl sees a dead person talking to her in a dream, It says that she achieves what she wants and based on her good condition. Seeing the dead man talking to the girl and giving him something in a dream indicates a lot of goodness in her life and pleasant surprises. If the girl sees that the dead man is talking to her for a long time, it indicates longevity for the girl and good work. See also: Interpretation Seeing a dead person imprisoned in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone talking to the dead in a dream about a married woman? If a married woman sees in a dream someone talking to a dead person, it indicates the achievement of what she wants and the stability of the family. If a married woman sees herself eating with a dead man in a dream It indicates a lot of good things coming to her home, her husband’s promotion at work or the neglect of a new profitable one. A dream about the dead speaking to the living in a dream about a married woman. It shows all her worries and problems in her life, and if you give her money, she will get a lot of good. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead traveler in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone talking to the dead in a dream about a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees a dead person talking to her and smiling in a dream, it indicates an easy birth and the fulfillment of her desires. If a pregnant woman dreams If a dead person gives her money or food, it portends a lot of goodness in her life and that she will enjoy herself and the newborn in good health. See also: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone talking to a dead person in a dream? If she sees in her dream a dead divorced woman talking to her at length, this indicates the end of her worries. Her living conditions improve and her life stabilizes. Seeing a dead woman gives divorce in a dream. It indicates the wealth and goodness that she will obtain, such as a prestigious job or a new marriage that will compensate for many good things. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead woman?

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white horse in a dream by the great imams

preview.html: A white horse in a dream. Every person sees a different vision in a dream and must interpret it to reassure himself and learn the interpretation of the vision he saw in a dream. Among the dreams that one of us sees a white horse in a dream, seeing a white horse in his dreams has many different meanings that we will explain in today’s website article. Interpretation of the vision: The horse White in a dream Ibn Sirin says that seeing a white horse in a dream means a lot of goodness and the achievement of many goals that a person seeks and wants to achieve. If a woman sees that she is riding a white horse, this means that she will meet a generous person and this will be an important reason for achieving what she wants from many dreams. And desires. Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is riding a white horse, this means that he will marry a beautiful woman and will obtain a lot of money from her. But if one thinks that he is riding a horse without saddles or chains and that this horse is interchangeable, then this It indicates his bad morals. But if he sees that he is riding a horse, this indicates that he will marry a woman from a noble family, and enjoys great status and power behind her. But if he sees that the horse is gathering in his house in a state of sadness, then this indicates the death of one of those close to the student, but if The vision was a gathering of dancing and joy, as this indicates great joy in it. People will gather. Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream, Al-Nabulsi | Imam Nabulsi says that if one sees in his dream that he is riding a horse and running very fast, this means that the dreamer has a state of positive energy and shows the power of insight and his ability to overcome difficulties and overcome difficulties. The situations, problems and tribulations that he faces. If a person sees that he is buying a horse, this indicates that the person he sees is a person with perfect morals and that many people love him, and the student will fall seriously ill. What is the interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream for a single woman: The horse indicates A large white horse indicates happy occasions and good news. Seeing a white horse inside the house and playing with it indicates good news and success in her life. Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream indicates peace of mind and psychological stability. Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream for a married woman: If her husband gives her a white horse This is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness that enters her home. Seeing a white horse in the home means good news such as pregnancy, the success of her children, or her husband’s promotion at work. Seeing a horse eating from it indicates the many benefits that she will receive and blessings in money and children. Interpretation of the vision A white horse in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a white horse in the nursery is evidence of sustenance and easy childbirth. If she sits at her feet, this is evidence of happy news in the coming period of her life. And if she sees that her husband brought a white horse to her home, this is evidence of abundant goodness and blessings in Her life. Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream by a divorced woman: Seeing someone giving her a white horse is evidence that friends are working with her and doing a lot of good.

Interpretation of seeing a white horse in a dream by a divorced woman: Seeing someone giving her a white horse is evidence that friends are working with her and doing a lot of good.

title: Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream? It indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. What does rotten peaches mean in a dream? Bad eyesight is not good anyway. The meaning of buying peaches for a man? It indicates a lot of money on his way to insight and his family. Interpretation of seeing a peach tree in a dream? Indicates On the dreamer’s energy and vitality. Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing peaches in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and goals that the dreamer aspires to in his life. Also, dreaming of peaches shows the energy and vitality that the dreamer has in reality. Seeing him picking them from trees indicates a great diet and abundance. Of the goodness that the dreamer will receive in his life in the very near future. Then the vision of eating yellow peaches in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from some diseases or some serious health problems. And if the person sees in a dream that he is eating peaches out of season, this is an unpleasant vision. It indicates the imminent death of a person afflicted with a vision of an incurable disease. If the dreamer eats a peach with a sour taste in his dream, then this vision indicates that he is going through a difficult period full of problems that affect him with stress and tension. Seeing peaches in a dream for a single woman. Seeing fresh peaches in a dream for an unmarried girl is a vision. Good and praiseworthy. It shows many positive things that will happen in the life of the girl with the vision. If the unmarried girl sees that she is buying peaches from the market, then this dream is good news for the fulfillment of her desires that she aimed to achieve in her real life. But if the girl sees in a dream If she did not buy peaches after seeing them, this is a sign that it is difficult to satisfy her desires in reality. If an unmarried girl sees a large amount of peaches in her dream, this is a sign of many good things and a lot of money on the way to her soon. If an unmarried girl sees someone giving her Peaches to eat, this is a sign that she will marry this person. If the peaches that this man gave her are sweet, this is evidence that he will live a stable life, and live in happiness and contentment, God willing. Seeing peaches being pressed in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will receive halal money. She has toil after toil and fatigue in reality. And when the girl sees in her dream that she is drinking peach juice, this is a good vision that symbolizes recovery from diseases. If she is sick or one of her relatives, if one of them is sick. Seeing red peaches in one’s dream is a good vision that symbolizes success and excellence, whether in Field of study or work. Seeing a peach tree in a dream for a married woman. See the point. The peach tree. A married woman indicates that her husband has a lot of good and abundant money and that his morals are good. This vision also shows that this woman throws her husband’s money on the poor and needy. Interpretation of a dream about peaches for a divorced woman if a divorced woman sees that she ate them In the dream that she was hungry and full, this is a sign that all her problems will end and her life will be stable. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is picking peaches from the tree, this is a sign that she will get married again.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sex at home and intercourse at home

preview.html: Seeing sex at home in a dream about a single girl, married to a pregnant woman, and having sex with her lover, husband, fiancé, incest, brother, father, sister, or mother, I dreamed of having a relationship with my husband, fiancée, or friend Ibn Sirin and more Wedding At home in a dream is one of the very disturbing dreams that we see in our dreams. It affects the dreamer, whether he is a woman or a man, in a major eclipse to get an interpretation, which is difficult to predict. The dream, according to one of the interpreters, is completely due to the details of the dream, and marriage is one of the important matters in life that occurs between spouses and has many important matters and implications. Interpretation of sex at home in a dream: Whoever sees that there are people exercising in his house, the dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into Problems, quarrels and disputes with relatives. The dreamer will be betrayed by a friend. Whoever sees workers working in his house quarreling with his relatives and abandoning a friend. Imam Ibn Sirin, one of the most famous dream interpreters in the world throughout history, explained to us that we see marriage in a dream with all its complete details, which is what we should A person knows it through the complete details of the dream, which differ from it. From one person to another. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman getting married in a dream is evidence that she will soon marry a man she loves. A girl who cries during a wedding in a dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness that will come to her. Marriage in one dream is evidence of a happy and blessed marriage in Life. For an unmarried woman to see that someone is marrying her in a dream means that she will live a happy life. Crying in a dream during a wedding is evidence of joy and blessings. Seeing an unmarried woman crying during a wedding indicates that she will marry a virtuous young man. The marriage of an unmarried woman who has not seen her husband. In a dream, it is evidence that her engagement will not continue in the near future. Seeing a girl getting married and not knowing who her husband is is a sign of blessing and goodness. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a man: Seeing a married man marrying a girl in a dream is evidence of the wealth that he will obtain to a large extent. Marriage in A man’s dream is evidence that he will be in a very prestigious position. Marrying a married man in a dream is evidence that you will make many profitable deals in the near future. Marriage in a dream is evidence of the money that a person will receive. A man who sees himself marrying a woman other than His wife in a dream is evidence that he will die or someone will die at his hands. A man marrying his wife again in a dream is evidence of the abundant goodness that he will receive. Seeing a wedding in a husband’s dream is evidence of happiness. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman Being married in a dream by a man who doubts her is evidence that the matter will turn out well. The marriage of a married woman in a dream is evidence of the great and special benefit of her husband. The marriage of a married woman to someone she does not know in a dream is evidence of the great changes that are occurring in her life. Marriage is A woman who has been married to her husband once

title: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping other people’s houses

preview.html: If the dreamer is married, this indicates the stability of her life, and we will return to the following lines and explain the interpretation of the dream of sweeping the house of others from an interpreted place, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing someone else’s house being swept in a dream for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is sweeping another person’s house in a dream , and she is happy in the dream. It indicates that her wedding is approaching, and that she will take care of her home next time, God willing. What if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is sweeping the house of others, and feels happy. He says that he will communicate with one of the people of this house, who was sweeping her in A dream. And seeing that single woman was sweeping away an enemy in her life, and she did not want him in her life. This is a sign of the end of this enmity and the great path in which this single person will live. And seeing that an unmarried woman sees in a dream a man asking her to clean his house, and he was a young man. She announces The date of his marriage to someone she loves very much in her life and is close to her. See also: Interpretation of dreams of cleaning someone else’s house Interpretation of seeing someone else’s house sweeping in a dream for a married woman If you see a married woman in a dream, she is sweeping a house other than her own. It indicates the stability of her life and her ability to get rid of problems And problems, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman asking her husband to erase someone else’s house in a dream. It showed that her husband is facing problems in her life and she cannot get rid of them. And a married woman saw that stranger was asking her to erase his degree. It is interpreted as being very close to Malik or The owner of that house that he saw in the dream. The married woman is looking for another house that needs to be cleaned, swept, and done. It is an indication that she is doing good in her life, and that she is living happily, God willing. Interpretation of seeing someone else’s house being swept in a dream for a divorced woman. Likewise, if a divorced woman dreams that she will dream By sweeping the house of others and she is happy. A clear explanation that the time of her marriage to the man she wants in life is near, God willing. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream that she is sweeping the house in a dream, and that was for strangers. It indicates that she will try to enter a new environment in her life and new people. And seeing A divorced woman asks a man to sweep his house for him in a dream but she does not see him. A sign that she will succeed in marriage and will be happy in her new life, God willing. A divorced woman dreams of sweeping the house and is forced to do so in a dream. An indication that he is getting into something that he does not want to do at the time. The current one and that he is forced to do it. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the house of someone I know. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping another person’s house for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer saw in a dream that he was sweeping a stranger’s house in a dream. She says that she is in the process of forming a new friendship in the coming period of her life, God willing. While A man sees in a dream that he is looking for a strange house, to sweep it in the dream. This is an indication that he is doing many things in his life to earn money from them. Likewise, the dreamer who dreams of seeing him sweeping the house in a dream, and it was for others. This is an indication that this dreamer will face things Many things bother him, and God knows best. And seeing a man in a dream means that he is forced to...

title: Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a wedding dress

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a wedding dress: I see my friend wearing a wedding dress in a dream. This dream shows the disappearance of worries and sorrows and the arrival of happiness for the pioneer. If one sees his girlfriend buying a white wedding dress in a dream, then this dream indicates achieving goals. But if a man buys a white dress for his wife, this indicates Marital happiness and family stability. Seeing my friend wearing a white cotton dress symbolizes the coming of kindness, livelihood, and abundant money. Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a beautiful dress. Seeing my partner wearing a beautiful dress in a dream means that the dreamer will hear good news in the coming period by God’s command. If he sees this vision in a single Her dream means that she will soon marry a good young man who respects and appreciates her. But if a married woman sees in her dream that her friend is wearing a beautiful dress, this indicates the happiness that she will have. Seeing a beautiful dress in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes kindness, abundant sustenance, fulfillment of desires, and comfort. Close and alleviate distress. I dreamed that my friend was wearing a wedding dress and she was single. Seeing a free girl seeing that her friend is wearing a wedding dress, this vision means her engagement soon, God willing. But if she sees that she is helping her friend wear the dress, this means that she will hear good news in the near future. In the event that She saw the white dress in her dream. This dream indicates the end of worries and sorrows and the end of problems. Seeing a wedding dress in a girl’s dream symbolizes that she is distinguished by a set of good qualities, such as the purity of her heart and the purity of her heart. Interpretation of a dream about my friend wearing a white dress: Seeing my partner wearing a white dress in a dream means That she will go beyond solving all the problems she faces. If she dreams of buying a wedding dress, this dream means that she will achieve all the goals she seeks. If she sees that her friend is wearing a wedding dress, this vision means that she will find a new job. I see the white wedding dress. It indicates blessings The many blessings that God has given to the dreamer, and she must praise him for his great courage. I dreamed that my friend was wearing a wedding dress when she was married. Seeing Married / Married. Her partner wearing a white wedding dress in a dream indicates a feeling of stability and psychological comfort. But if she saw that her husband gave her a beautiful white dress in the dream, then this dream It indicates marital happiness and a comfortable life. If she sees that she is wearing a wedding dress in her dream, this indicates financial and family stability, and God knows best. See the point. Married woman. Her friend wearing a wedding dress will be beneficial to her, her strength, and her abundant money. I dreamed that my sister was wearing a wedding dress. If the brother sees his sister wearing A white wedding dress in a dream, this vision means that he will get married soon, God willing. As for a married woman who dreams that her sister is wearing a wedding dress, this means that she will become pregnant, by God’s command, with a beautiful child. See the point: A free girl whose sister is wearing a white dress in a dream, her life will change for the better, God willing. This vision can be exceeded in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about betrayal in a dream: Betrayal is one of the most difficult feelings that any person experiences, especially those close to him who gave him great trust, and seeing betrayal in a dream has more than one meaning and more than one interpretations. And pregnant.Interpretation of a dream about betrayal: Dreaming about betrayal in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is characterized by a number of undesirable qualities that make him an unpopular person in his social environment. Among the interpretations mentioned about seeing betrayal in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is dissatisfied with his life and is looking all the time at The lives of others are viewed with envious eyes. As for someone who sees that he is betraying a dear relative, this indicates that the dreamer has no objection to betraying those close to him for his own benefit. Betrayal in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has many desires for revenge, and in general many problems will arise in his life. Ibn Shaheen said Regarding the interpretation of betrayal in a dream, it is an indication that in the coming period the dreamer will face a large number of problems with those around him. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed in his book Interpretation of Dreams that betrayal carries various interpretations. Here are the most prominent of them: Betrayal in a dream for someone who has power and money is evidence that he will be exposed to poverty in the coming period, as he will lose many important things. Seeing betrayal in a woman’s dream indicates the need to settle her relationships with everyone around her, because she always trusts the wrong people. Betrayal in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is constantly putting his money in unreliable places, so he is expected to suffer a major financial loss in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal by an unmarried woman. Betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign that life will put her through many trials. The difficult thing that she must face rationally and wisely so as not to get involved in more problems. Seeing betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream is a clear sign that her close friend will betray her, and this will be the main reason that will make her lose trust in everyone around her. Ibn Sirin confirmed that Seeing betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of a corrupt person trying to approach her and attract her, but she must be more careful. Ibn Shaheen also confirmed that seeing betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will be able, in a clear period, to reveal the truth to everyone around her and will not hesitate. Never remove evil from her life. The dream also indicates that the dreamer has a strong desire to marry the person he loves, but she must know that not in all cases what she wants is appropriate. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal of a married woman Cheating in a dream of a married woman is clear evidence of multiple The affairs of the husband and he must be careful. Among the interpretations mentioned also is that the dreamer does not adhere to any of the religious teachings and needs to re-examine himself and get closer to the Lord of the Worlds before it is too late. Betrayal in a dream usually symbolizes that the dreamer’s life will be exposed to poverty and hardship, and it is also expected that he will be exposed to trouble. Financial. Among the interpretations highlighted by a large number of dream interpreters is that it was placed between him
